DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of intravitreal autologous platelet concentrate (APC) injection during the surgery for refractory macular holes.
DOC.brief_title: The Intravitreal Autologous Platelet Concentrate Injection as an Adjunct of Vitrectomy for the Treatment of Refractory Macular Holes
